TopicTitle: More ore in Asteroids to Mine

Articles.Content:
I'd love a way to have a ton more ore available to mine in Asteroids, or even unlimited ore.

I want to build a big refueling station in orbit using an asteroid, but you get such tiny amounts of ore from an asteroid its hardly worth it. 

I know it would probably be unbalanced, but I don't really care. It just seems like fun.

Well, it would violate the law of conservation of mass....

But if you wanted to, you could just edit your Persistantace file and make the asteroid have an enormous mass, or have a % yield of some ridiculously large number.
Have you seen the mod for He3 mining on the mun ? It is unlimited as far as i can tell. With a bit of modification it could be converted to fuel (use UKS parts for that) :-)
Thats a good idea, but I'd like to use the stock resource system if possible.

See above RE conservation of mass ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Make them more massive, and that will solve that issue, but give you a host of others (because moving them becomes a bear).
